Given a dataset with SNP-genotypes of the following format

```{r, echo=FALSE}
Tiere <- c("Tier1","Tier2","Tiern")
Genotypes <- unlist(lapply(1:3,function(x) paste(floor(3*runif(10)), sep = "", collapse = "")))
Tier1 1201210201021....
Tier2 1211200101...
...
Tiern 0111022020...
```
